original: de nyid brgyad kyi lta ba zhes bya ba /

analyzed: jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag tshal lo

analyzed: khor da dngos po rtogs ba di

original: kun rdzob tha snyad rten byas nas //
analyzed: kun rdzob tha snyad rten byed nas

analyzed: dri cha sems ni khor ba ste

original: tha snyad dang bral mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: tha snyad dang bral mya ngan da

original: dper na sprin med nam mkha' ni //
analyzed: dper na sprin med nam mkha ni

original: gang la mi gnas phyag rgya che //
analyzed: gang la mi gnas phyag rgya che

original: aindra bh'u ti smra bar byed //
analyzed: aindra bhu ti smra ba byed

analyzed: khor ba mya ngan da ba dang bde dang sdug sngal gang jig kyang

original: sems kyi rtog pas sreg par byed //
analyzed: sems kyi rtogs ba sreg ba byed

original: dper na ga pur me bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na ga pur me bzhin no

original: de phyir rnal 'byor rtog pa ni //
analyzed: de phyir rnal byor rtogs ba ni

original: chung yang kun du sba bar bya //
analyzed: chung yang kun du sbed ba byed

original: sems dang sems nyid dngos po'o //
analyzed: sems dang sems nyid dngos po

original: dngos po thams cad mi gnas pa //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad mi gnas ba

original: dper na dri za'i grong khyer bzhin //
analyzed: dper na dri za grong khyer bzhin

original: mi gnas mi 'das 'khrul snang yin //
analyzed: mi gnas mi da khrul snang yin

original: aindra bh'u tis gnyis med smras //
analyzed: aindra bhu tis gnyis med smras

analyzed: de ni dbus ma de nyid de

original: bdag med chos kyang rang bzhin la //
analyzed: bdag med chos kyang rang bzhin la

original: thog mtha'i rang bzhin de nyid do //
analyzed: thogs mtha rang bzhin de nyid do

original: bde gshegs lta ba de nyid de //
analyzed: bde gshegs lta ba de nyid de

original: stong nyid don yang shes par bya //
analyzed: stong nyid don yang shes ba byed

original: dngos med dran med blo 'das smra //
analyzed: dngos med dran med blo da smra

analyzed: ri rab la sogs khrul snang yin

analyzed: aindra bhu ti smra ba byed
